org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters.BaseDateFormatHolder

Packages that use BaseDateFormatHolder
org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters The converters which convert various java objects into other java objects (e.g. string => int, array => string, etc.) 
 

Uses of BaseDateFormatHolder in org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters
 

Subclasses of BaseDateFormatHolder in org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters
 class CalendarConverter
          Passthrough to DateConverter for Calendar
 class DateConverter
          Handles conversions from objects into Date, generally the best way to handle this is to simply do conversions based on longs
Allows control over the conversion formats which are used by settings the patterns or the formats

Based on code from commons bean utils but updated for generics and removed complexity and (mis)usage of Exception
